DataElement.preferredName: Evaluable Patient Confirmation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator related to whether the patients evaluability is confirmed for eligibility for clinical trial participation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Evaluable Patient Confirmation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Patients whose response to a treatment can be measured because enough information has been collected._Having been established or verified._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Patients whose response to a treatment can be measured because enough information has been collected.

Concepts.definition: Patients whose response to a treatment can be measured because enough information has been collected.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having been established or verified.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
